select odc_id, own_driver_id, group_name, certificate_type, certificate_no, process_dt, certificate_validity_begin, certificate_validity_end, certificate_fee, certificate_attachment1, certificate_attachment2, certificate_attachment3, group_remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, is_deleted, company_id from t_own_driver_certificate
mapper.insert:
insert into t_own_driver_certificate (own_driver_id, group_name, certificate_type,certificate_no, process_dt, certificate_validity_begin, certificate_validity_end, certificate_fee, certificate_attachment1, certificate_attachment2, certificate_attachment3, group_remark, create_id, create_name, create_date,company_id) values
(#{item.ownDriverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.processDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.certificateValidityBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.certificateValidityEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.certificateFee,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.certificateAttachment1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateAttachment2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateAttachment3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,#{item.companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

update.foreach: update t_own_driver_certificate set own_driver_id = #{item.ownDriverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, group_name = #{item.groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate_type = #{item.certificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate_no = #{item.certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_dt = #{item.processDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, certificate_validity_begin = #{item.certificateValidityBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, certificate_validity_end = #{item.certificateValidityEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, certificate_fee = #{item.certificateFee,jdbcType=REAL}, certificate_attachment1 = #{item.certificateAttachment1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate_attachment2 = #{item.certificateAttachment2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate_attachment3 = #{item.certificateAttachment3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_remark = #{item.groupRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_id = #{item.updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{item.updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where odc_id = #{item.odcId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and company_id = #{item.companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.update: update t_own_driver_certificate set is_deleted = 1, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where own_driver_id = #{ownDriverId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
